A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film is direct insult to fans. It appears that instead of a real story they had a PC checklist of \"events\" Finn and Rose's arc was a complete waste of time with no real connection. Rey is perfect at everything\, all the time. Bizarro Luke does and says things that are the complete antithesis of everything he stood for. That's not darkness... it's simply lazy storytelling. Rian Johnson should never be let near Star Wars again.
